description: This map for the Theaters of War mode has players assume the role of a member of the UEE Advocacy tactical team or an outlaw in the Supreme gang in the battle for the Hathor Mining Facility on Nexus III. Discovered in 2445, budget issues forced the United Nations of Earth to sell exclusive access to the Nexus system to the Hathor Group who would go on to indiscriminately stripped the system of its resources before abandoning it. Over the decades, outlaws, squatters, and refugees began to move in as the system slipped into obscurity. The year is now 2934. The UEE is still attempting to restore order to this "Crossroads of Crime" by sweeping out the outlaws and squatters who have taken residence in the system.

title: Theaters of War - Miscellaneous Support
description: Ongoing art, design, and engineering tasks to support the Theaters of War game mode.

title: Third Person Camera V2
description: Adding improved follow behavior to the third-person camera, with increased support for ground vehicles. The camera will also fully disconnect during accidents for more cinematic crashes.

title: Thruster Capacitors V1
description: Players will have the ability to manage the amount of extra energy that goes into the thrusters, making critical decisions on the distribution of energy in order to defend, attack or just run away.

card.title: Power Management v2
card.description: Integration of the capacitor system and rebalance of all connected systems to accommodate

title: Tracking App
description: A mobiGlas app that displays the player's history of criminality and helps them understand the laws of the various jurisdictions.

title: Tumbril Nova Tonk
description: Building, implementing, and balancing the Tumbril Nova as drivable vehicle.

card.title: Tumbril Nova
card.description: Implementing the Tumbril Nova into the game

title: Turret Usability Improvements
description: Further improvements to turret gameplay, including giving gunners more flexibility and support when using additional weaponry.

title: UI - Death Summary
description: Updating our UI to give better player death information. This will show the player who killed them, how much damage they dealt to their killer, where the killing blow came from, and how long until they can respawn.

title: UI - Scoreboard
description: Convert the scoreboard to work with Building Blocks. The new interface will give players real-time access to position, current loadout/vehicle status, squad, name, rank, score, objectives, kills, deaths, assists, ping, and voice chat status.

title: UltiFlex Crossbow
description: All back-end tech required for making the UltiFlex Crossbow functional upon its forthcoming release.

description: Unannounced Content

description: Unannounced Vehicle

description: Unannounced Vehicle

title: Underwater Rendering/Caustics
description: Underwater rendering is a key point of water tech. Adding them will increase planet visual quality and realism for underwater flora and fauna.

title: Unified Login Queue
description: Creating a shared login queue to prevent massive login waves from negatively affecting backend services.

title: Updates - Broken Moon & Dying Star Maps
description: Updating the Broken Moon and Dying Star maps by increasing their overall size, adding new playable areas, more cover options, and new space assets.

card.title: Updates - Broken Moon Map
card.description: Improvements to the Broken Moon map

title: Utility Behavior
description: Encompasses all tasks for NPC Utility Officer behavior in the persistent universe and Squadron 42.

title: Vanduul Fleet
description: Implementing, polishing, and optimizing all features required to bring the various ships of the Vanduul fleet to gold standard.

title: Vanduul Warrior Armor
description: Encompasses all tasks related to armor for Vanduul warriors.

title: Vehicle Door Improvements
description: Updates to the underlying implementation of vehicle door setup that will allow for more advanced interactions, including ramps aligning to terrain and other ship-specific behaviors.

title: Vehicle Names and Serial Numbers
description: Adding the ability for ships that display custom player-assigned names on the side of their ships. Special serial numbers will also be shown, and all other ships will have unique serial numbers displayed, to identify them in the universe.

card.title: Vehicle Names and Serial Numbers
card.description: Displaying custom names and serial numbers on the sides of ships

title: Vehicle to Vehicle Loadout Spawning
description: Enabling ItemPorts and cargo grids to support vehicle-loading via VMA. This will also allow ASOP terminals to report vehicle-in-vehicle statuses.

title: Vending Machine Utilization T0
description: Enables AI characters to use vending machines to purchase food and drink.

title: Virtual AI Service
description: A service that drives the logic of Virtual AI, the go-between of Subsumption AI and Quanta AI.

title: VisArea Improvements
description: We will support VisAreas made out of multiple segments that can be individually animated, to allow us to animate more complex shapes. This will also reduce the designer burden during level building by changing the shape format from a custom to a common one.

title: VOLT Parallax
description: Designing and creating the Verified Offworld Laser Technologies Parallax energy assault rifle Includes asset creation, animation, and balancing.

title: VOLT Quartz
description: Designing and creating the Verified Offworld Laser Technologies Quartz SMG. Includes asset creation, animation, and balancing.

title: Volume Check Tool V1
description: Creating a tool to check volume restrictions for modular assets, allowing designers to flag potential problem areas for modelers before it gets passed down the pipeline to them.

title: Weapon Attach Points
description: Update and expansion of the current development toolset for authoring and maintaining weapons.

title: Weapon Capacitors V1
description: Players will have the ability to manage the amount of extra energy that goes into the weapons, making critical decisions on the distribution of energy in order to defend, attack, or just run away.

card.title: Power Management v2
card.description: Integration of the capacitor system and rebalance of all connected systems to accommodate

title: Weapon Handling T2
description: Introduces character animations while interacting with and customizing FPS weapons. The aim is to add a tactile look and feel to weapon handling, supporting the wider goal of high-fidelity character interactions with all relevant objects in-game.

title: Weapon Misfire & Wear
description: Adding the potential for certain weapons to misfire or malfunction depending on various factors.

title: Wheeled Vehicles Refactor
description: Implementing a new, more physical movement class, which will be the basis of a new and improved wheeled vehicle simulation.

title: Wrap3 Batch Interface
description: Development and creation of the Wrap3 and game mesh retopology pipeline.

title: XenoThreat Armor
description: Developing multiple armor variants for the Pyro gang, XenoThreat.

title: Xi'an Cargo
description: Construction and implementation of interior and exterior approved concepts.

title: Xi'an Facial Rigging
description: Rigging of the Xi'an character model for use in animation.

title: Zero G Push & Pull
description: Adding the ability for the player to traverse surfaces in zero-g by pushing and pulling with their hands. This will come into play when the player is wearing an EVA suit without thrusters, or if thrusters are turned off.

card.title: Zero-G Push & Pull
card.description: Zero-g traversal without EVA, using the player's hands

title: ZoneSystem Improvements
description: This encompasses several additions and improvements to ZoneSystem, optimizing spatial culling of areas and objects.
